name: Selen's Dream
description:
Selen just woke up from a heavy sleep, not very sure where she is. Disoriented as is, this little dreamy girl discovers you across the screen. 

Help her reach her objective, for she still feels sleepy and doesn't remember where she has to go. 
Apparently, there is some place she really needs to get to, but it is blurry at the time. 
By guiding her through this monochromatic dream land, and protecting her from the bizarre nightmare monsters, you will be able to understand better what is happening, and make her leave this strange limbo.

Controls:

- W A S D to move the camera.

- SHIFT to make Selen stop moving or keep going.

- Left Mouse to interact with Selen.
